messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] RE: Making Up Stories About People
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/30/2003 1:32:03 PM Eastern Standard Time, mina@mabb.net ... LOL - and at airports and in traffic jams, restaurants, malls -- we give
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/30/2003 1:32:03 PM Eastern Standard Time, mina@...
writes:


> And I, and everyone else who writes FanFiction, does this with TV shows or
> movies. That's why I could never understand people complaining about "just
> watching TV." It's always been a very rich experience for me, even when I'm
> "just veging"
>

LOL - and at airports and in traffic jams, restaurants, malls -- we
give people names that suit them and make up stories about where they're going
and why. The trick is not to enjoy it so openly that people suspect you're
laughing at them. We've been known to get entirely too wrapped up in it and forget
what we started out to do. :) JJ


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
